briefTitle: Transgender and Gender Diverse Individuals Screening for Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Transgender and GENdEr diverSe Individuals Screening for Breast Cancer: the GENESIS Study
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Transgender and gender-diverse individuals ≥18 years old who meet the ACR inclusion criteria
* Signed Informed Consent

Exclusion Criteria:

* Refuse to sign Informed Consent
